resources.string:
I'm an developer. I know C/C++, PHP, JavaScript, Delphi and now I learning Kotlin + Android! 
 
 I love to go out for launch. I'm very happy and always have a big smile on my face - this is why everyone calls me "Sorriso". 
 
 I'm very empolgated with this Android course and all possibilities it can bring to me!
